alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Georgetown and southeastern Williamsburg Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andrews, or 16 miles west of Georgetown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Andrews, Sampit, Graves, Oatland, and Earle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
